field.name: description
field.value:
It would be great to have the possibility to specify one part of a UniqueKey in the class that owns a collection and on inside the collection.
Please see http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-users/browse_thread/thread/63dc37a791cb3579 for examples.
Thanks,
Flo

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text:
Florian,
could you provide a testcase (and preferably a patch).

comment.author: mzywitza
comment.text: * '''Type''' changed from ''Bug'' to ''New Feature''. * '''Version Affected''' set to ''AR 2.0 Alpha1''.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: ActiveRecord is not actively maintained, closing this issue as won't fix because of its age. Feel free to relog a new issue on GitHub: https://github.com/castleproject/ActiveRecord/issues
